author: Howard Bamber
comment: The timezone ring needs to be LEGIBLE! FIX IT AND LOTS OF REVIEWS WILL BE 5* It's not legible in the pics. Grey and black! SHOULD BE BLACK AND WHITE AND BIGGER.
title: A TON OF REVIEWS POINT THE SAME FLOOR ...

author: Nick C.
comment: I really like this watch face. But one drawback I've found is: Although I can add cities to the dial, I can't seem to remove them - including the cities I've just added. If the developer could fix this I'd be happy to add another star to my rating
title: Remove cities from dial?

author: shachar tal
comment: Wear 2.0 not supported!  This is good looking and provides me with the required world time functionality. More customization would be appreciated: enlarge earth face, place a day and month in addition to date etc. Thank you!
title: Beautiful face

author: Timothy Connor
comment: From the NYC time zone Japan will be unreadable because of the flat spot on the Moto 360. On a 42mm dial the font is just too small to read comfortably.  I'd prefer some multifunctional use to the "globe" such as local weather or detailed battery info. The existing battery life dial just looks awkwardly placed even though I know it is similar to an actual watch.  But given the price and the value I don't regret buying it.
title: Most of my issues are specific to my use

author: Web DesignInc
comment: This watch face is simply beautiful. The 2 things I wish the dev would add:1)The ability to slightly change the font size or separately change the color/brightness intensity of the  city names and reference 24 hour ring fonts. 3) The ability to change the " worldtimer" logo wprding to whatever customized wording the user wishes (for example- Name, company name, etc). Add these and this watch face would be perfect.
title: Truly enjoy this watch face but 2 SUGGESTIONS

author: Felix Ng
comment: I would rate 5 stars if you can highlight/Slightly enlarge the selected city hour. Hard to read..

author: Justin Arnold
comment: 2 things it needs...sweeping second hand & ability to change dark face to a white/black combination. It would be a 5! Please add them.
title: Awesome watch

author: Corin Grieves
comment: Nice watch face, unusual yet classy and useful if you work with overseas clients or staff. Would be perfect if it had the configuration options from other Zuhanden faces, namely brightness and colour settings for ambient mode... Important on AMOLED faces like the Huawei.
title: Great but could be improved

author: Haruhiko Davis
comment: I travel a lot for work and needed a way to easily view the time from multiple timezones. This watchface is perfect for my needs. Other watchfaces only allow for one, maybe two, timezones. This one allows for several as they are shown in relation to your reference city.
title: Works well on ZenWatch 2

author: Sid Promyotin
comment: New ambient option is great. Still need to change the second hand to smooth motion. Looks too much like $2 Casio with the ticking
title: Ok

author: David Brown
comment: I downloaded this app from the play store and it will not open. It doesn't show in my apps list. When I say open from play store it comes up without the option. It has a refund button only. I don't know what to do.

author: Joe Chelena
comment: It would have earned a fifth star except that the 24 hour ring is too dim. There are times when I have close family members in several cities in different parts of the world. It would be useful to be able to increase the brightness of the ring.
title: Strong 4 stars.

author: adi grocott
comment: I love this face expecially that I can se world time without the need to push on something.
title: Works well

author: Stefan
comment: Doesn't work on my Gear S3, at least I don't know how to install it and instructions are not helpful.

author: George Ball
comment: Nice overall world timer.  Needs a way to select screen duration.
title: Pretty cool

author: Olaf Tietze
comment: Low bit ambient mode does not look good
title: Low bit ambient mode

author: Sydney Brown
comment: Like this a lot. Would do 5 stars if there were more than one interactive tap area. I would like about 4.

author: Andi Darmika
comment: No brightness setting for dim mode :(

author: Daevian Coco
comment: This design looked perfect on my LG G watch R!
title: Like the design!

author: Dr Brando Tamayo
comment: Needs to have a bigger world time ring that is more clear
title: Ok

author: Pierre Nacke
comment: This watch face is one of my favorites. Works very well on Sony SmartWatch 3.
title: Very nice!

author: Kelvin Chu
comment: If the watch face could add weather into it, then it will become a perfect one!
title: Add weather

comment: Everything on the watch face is too small. Not enough funtionality is editable in settings.
title: Too small on watch face

author: Franklin Taylor
comment: Love this watch. I would love to edit the cities on the watch face but still give it a 5☆

author: Anand Sampathkumar
comment: I downloaded but it is not updating the watch with this face

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hi, Please let me know your order number so I can refund. Also, it would be great to hear why it is bad. Did it not install? Best, Hans

title: Moto 360

comment: My favourite disign ! Ask me  - what's time in Australia now 😁😁😁 huge thanks for the creators of this app !!! 👍😁

author: Richard Pruitt
comment: Does not support ZTE Z10

author: Twinkal Patel
comment: Doesn't have IST time zone..

author: Tom Snodgrass
comment: Cool looking too.
title: Great way to see multiple time zones.

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Have no issues so far
title: It is good

author: M Ashi
comment: I like it

author: Marco Ferreira
comment: Doesn't show up to select it

author: Brook Zerihun
comment: Waste of money

author: Fad Juffa
comment: awesome
title: great

author: Luis Miguel Gonçalves
comment: No India cities...?....

author: Duane Allen
comment: Nice face

author: Richard Touma
comment: I am a frequent world traveler and I have always used expensive world time watches to keep up with the local and destination times. I have an idea for this developer and I hope they read this. Please incorporate a digital window that includes  the name of the city, the time and the date including the day and an option to toggle between analog and digital.
title: Works Great

author: Arif Rangwala
comment: I was skeptical to download due to negative reviews. I bought the app anyways as this is the only world timer app available. Works great. I am happy. Moto 360 and nexus 5.
title: Good app

author: kiran s bharadwaj
comment: Doesn't show on watch. Bought, didn't work. Resynced all apps, didn't work. Only way to re install is to refund and buy again, still didn't work and now I can't even refund. Moto 360 5.1.1
title: Doesn't show on watch

author: William Tai
comment: Would like to see if calendar of the day can be added to the hour ring with a color line or some sort of marker. This would be very useful to have in addition to the time zone of the world.
title: feature request
